content.rendered:
Resource Hub

Explore learning paths and helpful resources as you begin development with Dolby.io.

Quick Menu

Learn

Understand the fundamentals for using our APIs.

Build

Begin with getting started guides and sample code.

Explore

Find sample apps, integrations, and tips for how-to solve common problems.

  • Documentation

  • Project gallery

  • Events and webinars

Learn

Understand the fundamentals for using the Dolby.io APIs.

Blog

Introducing the Dolby.io Media Transcode API

The Transcode API provides another powerful tool from Dolby.io to help you understand, improve, and distribute media …
Documentation

Introduction to Media APIs

The Dolby.io Media APIs improve the sound quality of your audio and video files, at scale.
Documentation

Introduction to Communications APIs

The Dolby.io Communications APIs provide a platform for unified communications and collaboration. 
Documentation

Audio Diagnose API Guide

The Dolby.io Audio Diagnose API is designed to help you understand your media and detect problems.
Documentation

Dolby Voice®

Dolby Voice® is an award-winning audio communications technology.
Blog

Welcome to Dolby.io

Dolby.io is Dolby’s public cloud platform geared for software developers.
Blog

Developing Listening Skills for Audio Speech Content

Get better at listening. This post starts a series on how to get started developing listening …

Build

Begin with getting started guides and sample code.

Blog

Introducing the Dolby.io Media Transcode API

The Transcode API provides another powerful tool from Dolby.io to help you understand, improve, and distribute media …
Documentation

Enhance API Quick Start Guide

Our algorithms analyze your media and make corrections to quickly improve and produce professional quality audio.
Documentation

Getting Started with Communications SDK for JavaScript

This guide details how to create a basic audio conference application for the web.
Documentation

Media Analyze Speech API Quick Start Guide

The Dolby.io Media Analyze Speech API is designed to give insight into the speech portions of your …
Blog

Creating a Custom Mixer Layout for Streaming

A mixer layout application is a web app that the Dolby.io Communications APIs use to generate the …
Documentation

Getting Started with Communications SDK for iOS

This guide details how to create a basic audio conference application for iOS.

Explore

Find sample apps, integrations, and tips for how to solve common problems.

Blog

Introducing the Dolby.io Media Transcode API

The Transcode API provides another powerful tool from Dolby.io to help you understand, improve, and distribute media …
Documentation

An API to Measure Loudness

Loudness validation can check if the audio conforms with a specific loudness profile.
Documentation

Audio Quality Guide for Media

The quality of audio has a direct correlation with how media is experienced.
Blog

Generate a Transcript of Your Meeting

One of the commonly used features by developers who build with the Dolby.io Communications APIs is capturing …
Blog

Recording Audio on Android with Examples

How-to get started recording audio on Android with the most common libraries compared.
Blog

Using Firebase Functions as a Conferencing Authentication Service

Learn how to use the Google Firebase Functions to build an authentication service with Node.JS (in TypeScript) …
Blog

How to Use Video Conferencing with Angular

Dolby.io enables video conferencing with the true power of voice by using Dolby Voice® technologies.
Blog

Awesome Audio

Whether you are learning about databases, security, Python, JavaScript, networking, etc. there is a curated list of …

Project gallery

Reference applications that show you what’s possible when using Dolby.io APIs.

Dynamic 2D Map with Breakout Rooms and Spatial Audio

React web application in which participants can move around a 2D office floor plan supporting spatial audio.

Source code

Real time streaming, Video Call, Voice Call,

Standalone Conference App Supporting Multiple Layouts

React web application with multiple layouts and commonly used features such as recording, screen sharing, and chat.

Source code

Real time streaming, Video Call, Voice Call,

Classroom with Fixed Layout and Roles

React web application to demonstrate a fixed location layout assigned by user role in a classroom use case.

Source code
